original_title: Geneviève Everell, Miss Sushi : merci la vie
overview: Geneviève Everell, lead owner of Sushi à la maison, is young, vibrant but most of all, she is resilient. In this production, she recounts her extraordinary childhood. Geneviève was raised by a mother who was a drug user and a prostitute. Domestic violence, several moves and school changes could not, in the end, break the woman she was to become. A fascinating and touching story with a good ending.
title: Geneviève Everell, Miss Sushi : merci la vie
